description:
Revive and protect your lawn from pets

Our Pet Patch Kit repairs and strengthens lawns damaged by pets.

Designed for yards with pets, this kit combines Pet Lawn Bare Repair, a unique mix of urine-resistant grass seeds and mulch, with our Pet Patch Lawn Treatment, using advanced technology to rejuvenate damaged lawns. It's the perfect solution for pet-induced lawn spots, enhancing lawn resilience while ensuring pet safety.

Consciously formulated without pesticides and harmful ingredients, Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's unique challenges.

sections.kit_benefits:
Complete pet repair premium seed and patch solution to repair brown spots
Pet-resilient resilient lawns with urine-resistant grass varieties
Restores and protects lawns from pet urine and high-traffic
Pet-friendly formulations are gentle and effective for pets and lawn
Soil revitalization grass, nutrients, and mulch to rejuvenate damaged soil
Easy application with included, reusable hose-end sprayer
sections.whats_included:
2 jugs of Pet Lawn Bare Repair: premium seed, nutrients, and mulch for grass patching
Pet Patch Lawn Treatment: Advanced formula to repair spots with urine damage
sections.instructions:
Connect the hose-end sprayer to the Pet Patch pouch. Spray evenly across damaged areas for 15 seconds or the entire lawn for preventive care. Let it dry fully.
Apply Pet Lawn Bare Repair over bare patches or thin areas according to the recommended rate on the label.
Water newly seeded spots 1-2 times daily until germination, then resume a normal watering schedule.
Reapply Pet Patch and Bare Repair as needed for sustained lawn health and resilience.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How much coverage does this kit offer?
Pet Patch offers repair for 50 large pet spots or as a preventative treatment over 2,500 sq. ft. Pet Lawn Bare Repair offers coverage for 55 sq. ft. of grass patch repair.
When is the best time to apply this kit?
For the best results, apply Pet Patch between 50 and 85 degrees F, typically in the early morning or evening.
Seed Bare Repair Pet Lawn when daily temperatures consistently hold between 55-75 degrees F, usually in the spring and fall.
When is it safe for people and pets to reenter the area after applying my kit?
It’s safe for people and pets once all products have dried. If you have an extra curious pup, consider fencing off growing areas to protect new seedlings.
When can I expect to see results?
Noticeable improvement or grass growth within 14 days of combined Pet Patch and Bare Repair application.
How to Repair Pet Spots in Your Lawn
Here at Sunday, we love lawns. And dogs. And dogs on lawns. But we’re not too crazy about those inevitable pet spots, so we created a fix that keeps everyone happy. Dogs, lawns, and you included.
